game.description: Investigate the mysterious occurrence at the ancient ruins and put an end to whatever evil force is stirring.
game.objective: Defeat the dark sorcerer responsible for the disturbance.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting resistance to fire.

tasks.description: Speak with the local scholar to gather information about the ancient ruins' history.
tasks.objective: Obtain a cryptic clue about the dark sorcerer's lair.

tasks.description: Explore the ancient ruins, searching for any signs of dark magic or hidden passages.
tasks.location: The ancient ruins, located east of the village.
tasks.objective: Discover the entrance to the dark sorcerer's lair.

tasks.description: Infiltrate the dark sorcerer's lair and gather intel on their plans.
tasks.location: The dark sorcerer's lair, hidden within the ancient ruins.
tasks.objective: Gather information about the dark sorcerer's plan to resurrect an ancient evil.

game.title: The Shadows of the Ancients
